EN.title: General Industries
EN.subtitle: Marine Gearboxes and Drives
EN.content: Kumera not only produce gearboxes for industrial use but also provide equipment used in marine business including propulsion unit, multishaft PTO gear unit, hydraulic clutch unit, right angle gear unit etc.
